mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Perry, Reuben
mdRecord.dcterms:description: [Letter] of Nov. 9 received, with 3 [pounds] for money advanced for nails; Phill. cannot get cellars cleaned as he goes away at Christmas and Mr. Richardson will not be done by then; may get lathing done this week; will attend to everything at the building.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1809 December 23, Poplar Forest, [Bedford County, Virginia] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
